Set base url

Source: R/api-settings.R
set_url.Rd

Change the default API URL for use with the shortcut API.

set_url(url)

Arguments

url

shortcut API URL

Details

Using set_url allows you to change the API requests to point to a different API root. By default shortcutr functions use the V2.0 API, "https://api.shortcut.io/api/v2", as the basis for all requests

If you want to access an different version of the API you will need to use the set_url function to change the API root

Examples


# access the beta version of the API
set_url(url = "https://shortcut.io/api/beta")
